com.socialize.oauth.signpost.basic

Class DefaultOAuthConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socialize.oauth.signpost.AbstractOAuthConsumer
      • com.socialize.oauth.signpost.basic.DefaultOAuthConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAuthConsumer, java.io.Serializable

    public class DefaultOAuthConsumer
extends AbstractOAuthConsumer
    The default implementation for an OAuth consumer. Only supports signing HttpURLConnection type requests.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
